name: Piece 'n' See
description:
Piece them together correctly to see the whole picture.

A hyper-casual puzzle game prototype made with some existing assets in 3 days.

After working my day job in a hyper-casual team for more than a month, I've found that conceptualizing a decent hyper-casual game idea is such a challenging design practice. It's already hard to come up with a fresh gameplay idea, but guess what, you'll still have to turn it into something that literally anyone in the world could understand effortlessly.
